WorkItem.Description: there is an open redirect vulnerability in the application on logon eg http://www.nerddinner.com/Account/LogOn?returnUrl=http://google.com. While not severe on its own, this serves as a template for many applications that reuse this code, which can be affected.

Comments.Message: Just curious: do you see this as a vulnerability that will actually pass the attacking application useful information?Â  Or is it just a way to get someone to visit their site under the guise of visiting another site?
